msHeading.author: Nicolas de Byard
msHeading.title: Distinctiones thelogicae Veteris et Novi Testamenti

binding.p: Light red sheepskin binding, fastenings 15th or early 16th century; Sweden, Lund University library bindery, 20th century. Size: 230 x 175 x 45 mm.

Light red sheepskin binding over thick rounded oak boards. Two metal hook-clasp fastenings at fore-edge, plates and hooks from former binding, nails new. Rounded spine, tight back with four raised bands. Blind-tooled library code on leather label at the tail of the back. Embroidered endbands of white linen. Former edge trimming preserved. Pastedowns of parchment, front pastedown detached. All along sewing on four raised cords laced through the boards.

bibl.author: Pellegrin, E.
bibl.title: Manuscrits d'auteurs latins de l'époque classique conservés dans les bibliothèques publiques de Suède
